text: The Southeastern Anatolia Region is a geographical region of Turkey. The city with most people in the region is Gaziantep. Other big cities are Şanlıurfa, Diyarbakır, Mardin and Adıyaman. It is next to the Mediterranean Region to the west, the Eastern Anatolia Region to the north, Syria to the south, and Iraq to the southeast.
title: Southeastern Anatolia Region
